attributes.action: Suspend the Dublin Regulation and accept a fair quota of refugees from the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Show Cameron that we care and that we won't give up. We can prevent unnecessary suffering and inevitable deaths. We can challenge austerity and support refugees at the same time, we just need to speak up together. 

People are living in freezing and inhumane conditions on our doorstep.

Tweet #dontletthemfreeze @David_Cameron

https://www.amnesty.org/en/latest/news/2015/10/global-refugee-crisis-by-the-numbers/
http://www.unhcr.org/562a16326.html
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=36VQZlddIsQ
attributes.background: Merkel prioritised lives over regulation. Germany have accepted more than 800,000 refugees in a year while the UK offers to accept 20,000 over 5 years. The UK must accept a fair quota of refugees who have already reached the EU from the Middle East, Africa & beyond. People are suffering, help them.
